Submitter Information: Beckman Coulter Laboratory Systems (Suzhou) Co., Ltd.
Regulation Name(s): Immunoglobulins A, G, M, D, and E immunological test system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Beckman Coulter IgG Reagent for quantitative determination of immunoglobulin G in serum, plasma, and cerebrospinal fluid using immunoturbidimetric method on AU/DxC analyzers.
Indications for Use Summary: System reagent for quantitative determination of IgG immunoglobulins in human serum, plasma, and cerebrospinal fluid on Beckman Coulter AU/DxC AU analyzers to aid in diagnosing abnormal protein metabolism and inability to resist infectious agents.
